name: Plush Pet Shoppe (Web Ver.)
description:
You're a lonely person who just moved.

As you're on a run, you bump into a mysterious lady.

Luckily for you, she owns a pet shop! And not just any pet shop, a magical one!

Meet your new friend today! c:

Contains multiple endings, including one silly ending and 4 happy endings!

All designs made by the wonderful Plushpon!

Art, backgrounds, and story by me~

Music by sound

Sadly, the web version does not have animations! Please go download the game to get a version with animated credits, main menu, and an animation sprinkled within!
